verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Amazing grace how sweet the sound,
That saved a wretch like me;
I once was lost, but now am found
Was blind, but now I see.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
T'was grace that taught my heart to fear,
And grace my fears relieved;
How precious did that grace appear
The hour I first believed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Through many dangers, toil and snares,
I have already come;
'Tis grace has brought me safe thus far,
And grace will lead me home.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When we've been there ten thousand years
Bright shining as the sun,
We've no less days to sing God's praise
Than when we've first begun.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sublime gracia del Señor,
Que a un infeliz salvo,
Fui ciego, mas hoy miro yo,
Perdido y El me hallo.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Su gracia me enseña a temer,
Mis dudas ahuyento,
Oh, cuan precioso fue a mi ser,
Cuando El me rescato.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
En los peligros O afliccion
Que yo he tenido aqui,
Su gracia siempre me libri,
Y me guiara feliz.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Y cuando en Sion, por siglos mil,
Brillando esta cual sol,
Yo cantare por siempre alla,
Su amor que me salvó.
